list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: communicate information, facts, or news to someone in spoken or written words.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I told her you were coming
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi nói với cô ấy rằng bạn đang đến

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: decide or determine correctly or with certainty.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you can tell they're in love
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn có thể nói rằng họ đang yêu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: count (the members of a series or group).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the shepherd had told all his sheep
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người chăn cừu đã nói với tất cả những con cừu của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially in poker) an unconscious action that is thought to betray an attempted deception.
(in the Middle East) an artificial mound formed by the accumulated remains of ancient settlements.
